StyleIntent: Hand-rendered watercolor and graphite sketch style for concept explanations. Combines the warmth of traditional media with clear communication, creating approachable and memorable visual explanations.

BlendSources.Original: Pencil Watercolor Architectural Rendering (graphite/ink + watercolor on textured paper)
BlendSources.Adapted: Visual concept explanation focus with hand-crafted aesthetic

DesignPrinciples.HandCraftedWarmth: Traditional media feel creates approachable, memorable visuals
DesignPrinciples.ClarityThroughSketch: Sketchy style focuses attention on key concepts
DesignPrinciples.AuthenticImperfection: Human touch makes complex ideas feel accessible
DesignPrinciples.SelectiveDetail: Detailed where it matters, loose elsewhere

Background.Role: Clean paper white; preserve as highlight and negative space

PrimaryInks.Name: Deep Indigo
PrimaryInks.Role: Structural outlines, strongest edges, key linework, shadow masses

PrimaryInks.Name: Warm Brown
PrimaryInks.Role: Secondary ink tones, warm depth, organic elements

SecondaryWashes.Name: Sky Blue
SecondaryWashes.Role: Cool accent wash; background suggestions, fresh energy

SecondaryWashes.Name: Warm Coral
SecondaryWashes.Role: Warm accent wash; focal highlights, emphasis zones

SecondaryWashes.Name: Sage Green
SecondaryWashes.Role: Natural accent; organic concepts, growth indicators

Highlights.Name: Paper White
Highlights.Role: Primary highlight; preserved paper for light-catching areas

ColorUsageRules.Notes: Colors should feel like watercolor pigments, not digital fills. Maintain warmth and approachability.

LayoutPrinciples.FadeAndFocus: Sharp focus on key concepts, soft edges elsewhere

FocalHierarchy.Primary: Main concept with crisp linework and color
FocalHierarchy.Tertiary: Context and background with loose indication

PromptRecipe.StylePrefix: Hand-rendered watercolor and graphite sketch on clean white textured watercolor paper. Clean drafting influence with human hand. Preserve white space. Warm approachable feel for concept explanation.
PromptRecipe.CoreStylePrompt: graphite pencil and fine ink linework, varied line weight, watercolor washes with translucency and granulation, selective detail on key concepts, soft atmospheric fades, broad simplified shadows, presentation-board composition, concept explanation illustration
PromptRecipe.ColorConstraintPrompt: warm watercolor palette: Deep Indigo (#1E3A5F) ink for structure, Warm Brown (#8B5A2B) accents, Sky Blue (#87CEEB) cool washes, Warm Coral (#FF6B6B) focal accents sparingly, Sage Green (#9DC183) for organic elements, Neutral Gray (#A0A0A0) for shadows; colors should feel like watercolor pigments not digital fills
PromptRecipe.TextEnforcementPrompt: Only minimal labels and annotations if needed. All text must be perfectly legible, correctly spelled, and grammatically correct. Use hand-drafted block lettering in Deep Indigo or Warm Brown.
PromptRecipe.NegativePrompt: photorealistic, 3D render, CGI, vector illustration, perfectly clean uniform lines, flat cel shading, plastic look, heavy grunge, messy collage, watermark, signature, blurry text, garbled text, pseudotext, typos, nonsensical characters, neon colors, oversaturated digital colors
QualityChecklist: Varied line weight: bold edges for key concepts, fine for details
Translucent watercolor with visible paper texture; not fully painted everywhere
Colors feel like natural pigments, not digital fills
Atmospheric fades and soft edges present; focal elements crisp
Text (if present) is minimal and perfectly legible
Concept is clear and understandable despite sketchy style
